name: Idle Observatory
description:
Discover valuable night sky objects with Idle Obs, an Idle game where unlocking the secrets of the universe pays.

Start off by pointing out sky objects in the sky and getting paid for that data. Hire others to help you and eventually use multiple observatories all finding you valuable data about the objects in the universe.

Upgrade your data storage facilities to get more valuable data and earn more money. (Prestige)

Many more features coming...

This game is still in alpha early access. Join us in molding the game with help and suggestions to make it the best idle observatory game for you.
